Name: Gollem
Review Text: Must go spot od you love beer. Staff is helpful because selection is quite wide.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: So many choices and great prices but I'm really giving five stars for Eryc. He was so polite and took his time to make sure we chose a beer that we liked, he was very knowledgeable and was basically keeping the whole place on his own. Very refreshing compared to the awful service we received everywhere else in Amsterdam.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Best beer bar I found in Amsterdam. Super knowledgeable staff. Awesome beer from around the world. Reasonable prices. I will be back here the next time I come to Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Nice place with many‚Äôs craft beers.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: The biggest beer selection I've ever seen! 30 beers from tap, and 250+ bottled. The service was very good, and the atmosphere is great. They also offer a small selection of board games to pass the time.

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
One of fav place beer at Amsterdam with huge variety of drinks and beers. Very nice, cozy and kids friendly.
Very friendly fellow, as you walk into the bar and tell him what you feel like ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: We like it here every stay we had in Amsterdam we visited this bar. And every time it is a pleasure. Barkeeper is very good and can give you detailed recommendations for fitting beers for you. Next time again :)

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Amazing find in Amsterdam. There are so many different craft beers to choose from. Three walls of beers to choose from in fact! Really friendly staff and obviously got to love the Lord Of The Rings references thrown in.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Really nice place to try new tastes of beer. Friendly service

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Probably the best place for beer. The bartender is the Wikipedia for craft beers and this place has the largest collection of craft beers in Amsterdam (don't quote me on it). Have to try De moerslutel cyanide cyclops or the lowlander white ale infused. Any attempt to try everything on the menu would probably take 30 days.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: 30 kind of draught beers, and a very good atmosphere.. not enough for 5 star rating? WIDE selection of beers, very helpful qnd kind service. This place is my favorite so far.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Tasty beer, very friendly stuff, cozy atmosphere

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Latest addition to the Gollem empire, catering more for the modern craft beer generation, has a very good and large selection on offer, both bottle and tap. Knowledgeable staff will guide you through the vast choice of styles and flavours ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
Unbelievable amount of beers available !!!!
They also have cards and few games to play. Definitely a place I recommend !

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Beer heaven for craft beer lovers.  Staff was super friendly and very helpful with finding unique beers that I couldn't get in the states.  Beer that I pay $10-15 at home was less than 5 euros.  I would highly recommend this pub.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: If you're on Amsterdam and you love beer, you MUST visit here. I guarantee you haven't tried all of the hundreds of beers they have! Great beers, great staff, nice bar... Shame it's very hidden! What an Amsterdam beer gem.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: The finest selection and the most knowledgeable of staff! Ask for a recommendation

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great place with so many different beers. Especially one of the staff members was really helpful. The place is easy to get to by public transport. Best beer of the night was the IPA (Falco) from the US.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, very laid back. It can get very crowded later at night. Great selection of beer, mostly locals go there.. bartender was very helpful and spoke perfect English.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: It was awesome! The staff was very nice. If you cannot decide which beer to pick, the staff will help you with their knowledge and recommendations. ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: A nice cozy and friendly brewery that you can taste craft beers with a small variety of snacks. The stuff was really helpful to suggest a few beers and he spoke perfect English

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Excellent draft and bottle list. This location leans more to American beer I would say, not surprising considering the neighborhood. Super friendly and knowlwedgeable bartenders.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Amazing place with an incredible variety of beer and a really knowledgeable staff. Was in town for 3 days and this was one of the places I visited twice.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Selection of beers is top-notch, the staff friendly and knowledgeable, the music on the hard and heavy side \m/

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
Huge selection of beers..
Try their Buck beers if they have at that time of the year

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Latin barman absolutely sad and unprofessional attitude . Altough there are quite a lot different styles of beer. My advice try different bars always part of caf√© gollem. Better and friendly customer service

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer selection! With better service, they would get five stars.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: My favourite bar in Amsterdam! Amazing  choice of beers, talented staff with great knowledge and exquisite service! As a beer lover this place I paradise.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: All the Gollems are worth going to and spending time in, great beer selection! Got some time in Amsterdam, hit them all, you won't be disappointed!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Very nice place and good beer üòã

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Good spot and good service with a wide variety of tasty craft beers.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: This bar offers a forever changing selection of beers. If you're crazy about beer, or if you're interested in tasting different kinds of craft beers, then visit the bar. The bar is small, but it is cosy. Be prepared to pay a bit more for the various beers, as the selection of beers is pretty much only craft beer.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Amazing beer selection! Plenty of local ones (breweries from Amsterdam), Dutch beers, Trappist beers, and about the same amount from all over the world. My favorite place to go for a few drinks after a tiring day. It's cosy to sit with ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Very fun bar with an amazing beer selection and wonderful people. My husband and I were visiting on our honeymoon and had been told that this was the bar to go to if you're looking for craft brews. Our bartender was very friendly and ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Wonderful craft beer pub with a huge selection of beers including unique golem beers brewed especially for the cafe. Very helpful waitress who helped my friend find a beer she would enjoy as she isn‚Äôt a big beer drinker. Nice place to chill out for an hour or so.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Don‚Äôt miss it! Great selection of beers, and nice venue.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: So, first of all, the manager was way to drunk. He was a bit persuasive and we felt uncomfortable. Our experience with him would not even get 1/5 stars. But, the other bartenders, Samir and Roel (two guys with beards hahahah) were above expectations, and they handled the situation perfectly. Big love, 10/10.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Gollem chain is great - all bars have a wide variety of beers, staff is always there to help with the choice and the atmosphere is awesome. Some places are quite tiny but otherwise it's a great beer pub.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: My local pub in Amsterdam. They have a great assortment of beers - from local beers, Belgium, etc. Both indoor and outdoor seating. It is a a bit small and quickly crowded on Friday and weekend, so get there early if you wanna have a seat! The barmen have also good advice for beers and there draft beer change regularly.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: This is where locals go and it's got good beers on tap.  It's small, like really small but you won't be disappointed if you love a real beer. Conveniently near a tourist area without as much of the influx of tourists.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: This was our go to beer house while in Amsterdam. We stayed at the Eden Hotel, so the bar was within a two minute walk from the hotel. The bar had an unparalleled selection of beers; there were hundreds of beers available. I did not see ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
Incredible huge number of different types of beer. And bar keeper knows them very well and is super nice.
Hint: Check the hundreds of full beer bottle collection from all over the world on the walls, ceiling and above the bar.

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
Simply an awesome spot with more than a great selection.
Staff is really polite and professional.
Actually ,there's not a single thing i dislike about this place. Could easily recommend Gollem for everyone who enjoys brewery products and a nice relaxed atmosphere.

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
Plus side: lot's of nice beers.
Downside: the bartender knew very little about them, he would not suggest anything exciting when asked nor and the beers from the tap came half foam.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Very good local IPA, nice service too

Name: Gollem
Review Text: 27 craft bier. We love it!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great selection of beers with A LOT to choose from! A bit slow service and clearing of the tables. Worth a visit if you like craft beer.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great selection of beers! From both the Netherlands and many other places around the globe.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: One of my favorite bars in Amsterdam. Small and cosy. Perfect to sit down with a small group of friends and have a beer together. Great selection of beers and friendly bartenders.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: The amount of beers they serve is insane, the recommendations from the bartender were really good and the prices are fair (cheaper than I expected). If you like special beers, this is the place to be.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer bar but no food.  30 taps, a few of their own brewed beers.  Staff and patrons were very nice.  A little outdoor seating on the sidewalk.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Good beers, i recommand to checküòâ

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Solid beer bar. Good selection including a few fun/fairly hard to get items. I just got whatever de molen  calls Rasputin now for a decent 6 euro something. Loses a star as you will inevitably have to put up with a group of British tourists ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: If your are looking for diversity in types of beer, Gollem it's the place to go. They have around 300 different brands of beer... Go and try it out... If you go there please do me a favor don't ask for Heineken.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Easy place to grab a drink. Many beers on tap which didn't disappoint. Bartenders speak multiple languages to make it easy to order.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Cosy place, perfect to spend 2 jours and chill. They got a wide beer offering, and the music is loud enough to be appreciated but low enough so you have proper conversations! On top of that, the crew is very friendly and always up to share advice!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Best bar in town for beer lovers !!!!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Excellent beer selection. Good atmosphere and friendly staff. Definitely recommended. It could be very busy on some nights. One of the best places around Rembrandtplein for my liking.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Lovely bar specialized in Dutch, European and American craft beers. A lot of choices on draft and in bottle. Highly reccomended if you love craft beer. Staff is super nice

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great unassuming beer cafe with large selection. Folks here know the beers and can make good recommendations

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Literally the only good craft beer bar in the neighborhood. Can get crowded (duh, you're in the middle of touristic area). Bar personnel generally knowledgeable about their beers.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer bar just outside the Centrum. Beer list is a lot bigger than the location downtown, but it lacks the "brown cafe" vibe. Completely feel at home here though!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: I always come here when I'm in Amsterdam. A lot of different beers on draft from different breweries in different countries and very friendly staff with great knowledge of the beers. The cafe itself is very cozy.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Absolutely massive selection of beers, you could spend your whole trip drinking here and you still wouldn't manage to try them all! ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Gollem has 4 cafes in Amsterdam and Amstelstraat has by far the most eclectic selection of beer out them all. It's location means it gets crowded with tourists and thats not always a good thing. Don't be surprised if the guy next to you is ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Kutservice!  I was looking to try this bar for some time now and finally I did this last Sunday! I was completely disappointed about the service because I've asked for a beer and the bartender poured almost half of if on the counter and ‚Ä¶

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Best craft beer bar in Amsterdam. Great selection of beers from breweries like Mikkeller, Beerbliotek, Eviltwin, Beavertown, Lervig, Wild Beer co and many others. Definitely worth a visit.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Amazing selection of beers.  The bartender made great recommendations based on my wife and I‚Äôs taste in IPAs.  Highly recommend.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Millions of beers, friendly knowledgeable staff, nice to chill with‚Äã a beer on the small sidewalk terrace.  I can get most of the Nor-Cal micro brews I miss from home.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Great beers! As a local a nice place to meet all walks of life :)

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Nice place to have a beer - and they have quite a variety. If you're into strong ones ask them for a Christmas Brew called "Stille Nacht" (Quiet Night).

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great little bar  Very wide selection of well kept draught and bottled beers. Just around the corner from the Ice Bar, and much better!!  Recommended!!!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Excellent selection of beers. A must try

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Huge beer selection and super friendly bar keepers, who will help you to find the best beer for your taste

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer selection in this small bar with real Dutch vibes. I recommend the tasty cheese platter alngside the superb local beer selection.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: One of the best draft beer selections in Amsterdam and by far the most compelling canned/bottled craft beer selections in town!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Came here for a beer the first night I was working in the city. Then came here on every subsequent night. The beer selection is amazing and this is a haven for both local and traveling beer lovers.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Visited this place over 20 times, still have not managed to taste all the beers. Its a beer lovers paradise.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great atmosphere as well as splendid beer selection...  enjoyable visit every time

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer geek bar. Always a few good ones on tap and an extensive listing of bottles and cans from around the world.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Beer was fresh and nice, and mostly thankyou so much for big hospitality of Yannick (hope I spelled it right) on the first day of 2020 !!!!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Amazing beers in this nice and cosy place close to rembrandtplein. They've over 30 beers on the draft and over a 100 bottled ones... Always spoilt for a choice

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beers! Good snacks! It is not too spacious and it gets crowded, but still worth to stop by and have a beer.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Decent selection of different beers, including a "Gollem beer". Also, they serve nice cheese platters and other bar food.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Widest selection of sour beers, gueuzes and lambics in Amsterdam (and many other beers!). Cozy atmosphere and constantly changing taps

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great taps and great Belgian bottle beer selection. Wi-fi and electric outlets and a very relaxed, low key atmosphere.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Fantastic range of beer on tap (about 30) and bottles. Lot of locals. Cosy place with friendly staff.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Nice place but small and the stuff is not so friendly. They have a great beer selection but a bit pricey

Name: Gollem
Review Text: So many beer options! The place is small, but you can have drinks outside too. Not many food options, but amazing beer selection.

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Great beer selection, the staff are friendly and know their beers.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Excellent special beer cafe! Lots of different kinds of beers with 30 beers on the tap. Great place to visit!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: I love this bar. Cozy atmosphere, great bartenders that know the beers, and delicious, strong Belgian beers. My favorite bar in Amsterdam!

Name: Gollem
Review Text: More specific, more crazy beers on tap, please

Name: Gollem
Review Text: Nice place, friendly staff. Great choice of beers, staff knows what to recommend. Not cheap.

Name: Gollem
Review Text: One of the best bar for beers!many options and really good quality beers!

Name: Gollem
Review Text:
A really big variety of beers.
Atmosphere is perfect.
Try the house beer gollem in various kinds

Name: Gollem
Review Text: A bit overpriced and the service could be a bit better, especially when it's busy and the  server is chatting to his friends for 10 mins, but the beer selection is fantastic and it's in a good location

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem

Name: Gollem
